title: hwb()
description: The `hwb()` CSS function specifies a color using hue, whiteness and blackness values (HWB model).
content: The function that defines colors using the HWB (Hue, Whiteness, Blackness) model. Itâ€™s similar to HSL, but instead of saturation and lightness, it uses whiteness and blackness to adjust the color, making it easy to mix shades and tones.
